introduction.title: Hello, I am
introduction.subtitle: a Full Stack developer
introduction.description: Software developer with ongoing bachelor's degree in Information Systems and passionate about technology.

aboutMe.description: .NET Developer specialized in creating robust and scalable web applications. Experienced in full stack development with .NET, xUnit, SQL and NoSQL databases. Focused on appropriate architecture for the problem to solve and SOLID principles to deliver high-quality solutions with modern and intuitive interfaces.
